pullrequest.title: Create a standard configuration for VMRC

content.raw:
I added the robot\_localization bits to the tutorial in order to generate the necessary transforms to the odom fixed frame.

‌

Only issue I see is placement of the sensors.    I don’t think that is a showstopper, so will let Carlos decide if it is worth fixing now or wait till later?
content.html:
I added the robot_localization bits to the tutorial in order to generate the necessary transforms to the odom fixed frame.

‌

Only issue I see is placement of the sensors. I don’t think that is a showstopper, so will let Carlos decide if it is worth fixing now or wait till later?
